Threading the Eye.name: Threading the Eye
Threading the Eye.flavor: Your gentle extension of a single finger nevertheless passes easily through flesh and bone.
Threading the Eye.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can use the movement technique from any at-will or encounter monk power you know, even if it is expended. Doing so does not expend that movement technique if it has not already been expended.

Fallen from the Thread [Attack Technique.name: Fallen from the Thread [Attack Technique]
Fallen from the Thread [Attack Technique.flavor: You pass right through your enemiesâ€™ grasp, even when one has you held.
Fallen from the Thread [Attack Technique.effect: If any creature is grabbing you, you automatically end that grab and then shift 1 square.

Wind-Blown Pine.name: Wind-Blown Pine
Wind-Blown Pine.flavor: As a wind through the boughs of a tree, you flow through your enemies.
Wind-Blown Pine.effect: You shift twice your speed. You can shift through enemies during this movement.
